Items.Title: Application No. C 140238 PQM submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD) pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the acquisition of property located at 492 St. Nicholas Avenue (Block 1959, Lot 54), in the Borough of Manhattan, Community District 10, Council District 9.
